name: AVTimedMetadataGroup
desc: A collection of metadata items that are valid for use during a specific time range.

items.name: init(items: [AVMetadataItem], timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates a timed metadata group initialized with the given metadata items.

items.name: init?(sampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer)
items.desc: Creates a timed metadata group with a sample buffer.

items.name: var items: [AVMetadataItem]
items.desc: An array of metadata items in the timed metadata group.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range for the timed metadata.

items.name: func copyFormatDescription() -> CMMetadataFormatDescription?
items.desc: Creates a format description based on the receiver's items.
